article_text:
Reader Opinion: He didn't know

He didn't really know Pastor Jeremiah Wright, who preached anti-Americanism and racist diatribes from the pulpit. Obama was a member there 20 years and donated $20,000 to Wright's church. Wright officiated Obama's wedding.

He really didn't know Bill Ayers, founder of Weather Underground, a self-described communist revolutionary organization that participated in bombing New York police headquarters 1970, U.S. Capitol building 1971, Pentagon 1972. Served Ayers as executive officer 1995-99.

He really didn't know Tony Rezko, Illinois businessman found guilty 2006 of federal charges, business kickback from the state. In 2008 Rezko found guilty of six counts wire fraud, six counts mail fraud, two counts corrupt solicitation, two counts money laundering. Rezko helped raise $14 million for Obama's U.S. Senate run. Obama purchased new home for $1.65 million, $300,000 off asking price through Rezko attention.

He didn't know Benghazi was a terrorist attack. Clinton did.

He didn't know the U.S. government had a "spending problem."

He didn't know NSA was spying on American people and foreign governments.

He didn't know the Justice Department was investigating conservative journalists.

He didn't know about Fast and Furious, people killed.

He didn't know about the VA scandal.

He didn't know Obamacare was a hoax on the "stupid American people."

He didn't know Jonathan Gruber (who wrote Obamacare) who as at the White House nine times.

He didn't know you'd lose your health insurance.

He didn't know trading five terrorists for one army deserter was wrong (three of these terrorists are back killing people).

He didn't know about "Hillary's email." Saw it on TV.

He didn't know ISIS was little more than a "JV team."

His contempt and mightier than thou attitude toward people is pathetic, but he certainly didn't lie about his transparency. There's nothing there—a zero!

Jack Schmidt

Pequot Lakes

He really didn't know Tony Rezko, Illinois businessman found guilty 2006 of federal charges, business kickback from the state.
He didn't know Obamacare was a hoax on the "stupid American people."
He really didn't know Bill Ayers, founder of Weather Underground, a self-described communist revolutionary organization that participated in bombing New York police headquarters 1970, U.S. Capitol building 1971, Pentagon 1972.
He didn't know trading five terrorists for one army deserter was wrong (three of these terrorists are back killing people).
